text:
The rather new ProxyBadHeader directive is not documented. At least yields a
search for "ProxyBadHeader" on the apache site no results and I could not find
it under the directives list.
creator: cbarth@bigfoot.com

text: Ah yeah, somehow it was forgotten. assigned ...
creator: nd@perlig.de

text:
The directive is now documented. You can find it online at
<http://httpd.apache.org/docs-2.0/mod/mod_proxy.html#proxybadheader>.

Thanks for your care and thanks for using Apache.
creator: nd@perlig.de
